org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.thirds.controllers

Class CustomExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • org.lfenergy.operatorfabric.thirds.controllers.CustomExceptionHandler

  • @RestControllerAdvice
public class CustomExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    CustomExceptionHandler.
    • Handle IOException and FileNotFoundException as 404 errors
    • Handle Api errors according to their configuration
    See Also:
    ApiError, ApiErrorException
